message.body: I'm home if you want to come get mudding stuff. Do you know where and what it is?
I was assuming it was in the van because I scoured your house and didn't find any.
Can I check the van in the morning under the light of day?
Yeah, I'm working in Germantown in the morning but if you come between 8 and 9am I can be here.
Also, Adam may still have a bunch of that stuff.
I asked him but he said he didn't
Hmmm. There is one husky bag of drywall stuff in the van. I'll stick it in the front of my house, maybe it's all in there.
I don't see the husky bag in your house
I'm heading there now. It's still in the van.
